name: Centrifugal Pump
description: Dynamic pump using a rotating impeller to increase fluid pressure via centrifugal force, conforming to API 610.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Centrifugal Pump with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Reciprocating Pump
description: Positive displacement pump using a piston or plunger for high-pressure applications.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Reciprocating Pump with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Centrifugal Compressor
description: Dynamic compressor using rotating impellers for continuous gas compression, typical for pipeline or process gas.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Centrifugal Compressor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Reciprocating Compressor
description: Positive displacement compressor using pistons for high compression ratios, often used for hydrogen or makeup gas.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Reciprocating Compressor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Screw Compressor
description: Rotary positive displacement compressor using helical screws, common for instrument air or refrigeration.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Screw Compressor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Axial Compressor
description: High-flow dynamic compressor with multiple stages of rotating and stationary blades, used in LNG trains.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Axial Compressor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Gas Turbine
description: Internal combustion engine using a continuous combustion process to drive generators or mechanical equipment.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Gas Turbine with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Steam Turbine
description: Turbine extracting thermal energy from pressurized steam to perform mechanical work.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Steam Turbine with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Electric Motor
description: Electromechanical device converting electrical energy into mechanical energy, typically an AC induction motor.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Electric Motor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Fin Fan Cooler
description: Air-cooled heat exchanger using fans to force air over finned tubes for process cooling.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Fin Fan Cooler with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Blower
description: Machine for moving air or gas with a moderate pressure increase.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Blower with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Agitator
description: Device consisting of a rotating shaft and impeller for mixing liquids or slurries in a vessel.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Agitator with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Centrifuge
description: Equipment using centrifugal force to separate fluids of different densities or solids from liquids.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Centrifuge with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Conveyor
description: Mechanical handling equipment for transporting bulk solid materials like coke or sulfur.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Conveyor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Turboexpander
description: Radial inflow turbine used to cool gas streams and recover power, essential in cryogenic gas processing.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Turboexpander with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Pressure Vessel
description: Closed container designed to hold gases or liquids at a pressure substantially different from ambient.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Pressure Vessel with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Storage Tank
description: Large container for holding liquids, typically atmospheric, conforming to API 650.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Storage Tank with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Floating Roof Tank
description: Storage tank with a roof that floats on the liquid surface to minimize evaporative emissions.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Floating Roof Tank with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Spherical Tank
description: Spherical pressure vessel for storing high-pressure fluids like LPG or ammonia.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Spherical Tank with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Bullet Tank
description: Horizontal cylindrical pressure vessel with hemispherical heads for pressurized storage.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Bullet Tank with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Reactor
description: Vessel designed to contain chemical reactions, often with catalyst beds and internal distributors.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Reactor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: FCC Regenerator
description: Vessel in a Fluid Catalytic Cracking unit where coke is burned off the catalyst to restore activity.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a FCC Regenerator with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Coke Drum
description: Large vertical vessel used in the delayed coking process for thermal cracking of heavy residues.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Coke Drum with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Separator
description: Vessel used to separate well fluids into gas and liquid phases (two-phase) or oil, gas, and water (three-phase).
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Separator with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Distillation Column
description: Vertical vessel containing trays or packing for separating liquid mixtures based on boiling points.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Distillation Column with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Stripper Column
description: Column used to remove light components from a liquid stream using a stripping vapor.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Stripper Column with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Absorber Column
description: Column where gas components are absorbed into a liquid solvent, common in amine treating.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Absorber Column with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Scrubber
description: Vessel designed to remove particulates or liquid droplets from a gas stream.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Scrubber with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Desalter
description: Vessel using an electrostatic field to coalesce and remove brine and salts from crude oil.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Desalter with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Pig Launcher
description: Pressurized barrel used to insert a pipeline pig into a pipeline for cleaning or inspection.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Pig Launcher with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Pig Receiver
description: Pressurized barrel used to retrieve a pipeline pig at the end of a pipeline segment.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Pig Receiver with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger
description: Heat exchanger consisting of a shell with a bundle of tubes inside, the most common type in process industries.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Plate and Frame Heat Exchanger
description: Heat exchanger using metal plates to transfer heat between two fluids, offering high efficiency in a compact size.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Plate and Frame Heat Exchanger with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Kettle Reboiler
description: Shell and tube heat exchanger used to vaporize the bottom product of a distillation column.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Kettle Reboiler with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Fired Heater
description: Direct-fired furnace used to heat process fluids to high temperatures, such as crude feed or reformer feed.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Fired Heater with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Waste Heat Boiler
description: Boiler that generates steam by recovering heat from hot process gas streams.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Waste Heat Boiler with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Condenser
description: Heat exchanger specifically designed to condense a vapor stream into a liquid.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Condenser with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Gate Valve
description: Multi-turn linear motion valve used primarily for on/off service with low pressure drop.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Gate Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Globe Valve
description: Linear motion valve used for stopping, starting, and regulating flow.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Globe Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Ball Valve
description: Quarter-turn valve using a spherical closure element for quick shutoff.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Ball Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Butterfly Valve
description: Quarter-turn valve with a disk closure, suitable for large diameter lines and low pressure drop.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Butterfly Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Check Valve
description: Valve that allows fluid to flow in only one direction, preventing backflow.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Check Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Safety Relief Valve
description: Spring-loaded valve designed to automatically relieve excess pressure to prevent equipment failure.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Safety Relief Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Control Valve
description: Power-operated valve used to regulate fluid flow, pressure, or temperature in response to a controller signal.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Control Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Choke Valve
description: Specialized valve used on wellheads to control the flow rate of fluids produced from a well.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Choke Valve with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Coriolis Flow Meter
description: Mass flow meter that measures density and flow rate directly using the Coriolis effect.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Coriolis Flow Meter with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Ultrasonic Flow Meter
description: Non-intrusive flow meter using ultrasonic waves to measure fluid velocity.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Ultrasonic Flow Meter with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Pressure Transmitter
description: Sensor that measures pressure and converts it into an electrical signal for control systems.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Pressure Transmitter with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Temperature Transmitter
description: Sensor assembly used to measure temperature and transmit the data to a control system.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Temperature Transmitter with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Radar Level Transmitter
description: Non-contact level measurement device using radar pulses to determine liquid level in a tank.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Radar Level Transmitter with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Gas Analyzer
description: Instrument for continuous online analysis of gas stream composition (e.g., Gas Chromatograph).
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Gas Analyzer with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Switchgear
description: Combination of electrical disconnect switches, fuses, or circuit breakers to control and protect electrical equipment.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Switchgear with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Transformer
description: Static electrical device that transfers energy between circuits while changing voltage levels.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Transformer with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Variable Frequency Drive (VFD)
description: Electronic controller that adjusts the speed of an AC motor by varying the frequency and voltage supplied.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS)
description: Electrical apparatus that provides emergency power to a load when the input power source fails.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Diesel Generator
description: Combination of a diesel engine and an electric generator to produce electrical energy.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Diesel Generator with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Flare Stack
description: Elevated vertical stack used for burning off unusable waste gas or flammable gas released by pressure relief valves.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Flare Stack with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Strainer
description: Device with a mesh screen used to mechanically remove solid debris from a flowing fluid.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Strainer with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Steam Trap
description: Automatic valve that filters out condensate and non-condensable gases while preventing the escape of live steam.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Steam Trap with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.

name: Flame Arrestor
description: Safety device that stops fuel combustion by extinguishing the flame front.
image_prompt: High-fidelity 3D engineering rendering of a Flame Arrestor with industrial metallic finish, visible flanges, and realistic lighting.
